title: Pascal's Triangle
description: Given an integer numRows, return the first numRows of Pascal's triangle. In Pascal's triangle, each number is the sum of the two numbers directly above it as shown:   Example 1: Input: numRows = 5 Output: [[1],[1,1],[1,2,1],[1,3,3,1],[1,4,6,4,1]] Example 2: Input: numRows = 1 Output: [[1]]   Constraints: 1 <= numRows <= 30
